bioconda.name: bioconductor-iaseq
bioconda.summary: iASeq: integrating multiple sequencing datasets for detecting allele-specific events

biotools.summary: It fits correlation motif model to multiple RNAseq or ChIPseq studies to improve detection of allele-specific events and describe correlation patterns across studies.

bioschemas.name: iASeq
bioschemas.summary: It fits correlation motif model to multiple RNAseq or ChIPseq studies to improve detection of allele-specific events and describe correlation patterns across studies.
